DOC.brief_title: The Acquisition Blood Skin Samples From Normal Volunteers Support Research Activities Dermatologic Diseases
DOC.detailed_description: Background : -This protocol concerned acquisition blood , skin , mucosal sample healthy volunteer patient select skin disease support basic science clinical research activity Dermatology Branch intramural Laboratories Branches NIH Clinical Research Center . Objectives : ( Primary ) -To allow collection blood , skin , mucosal sample healthy volunteer patient select skin systemic disease need support research activity Branch Laboratories Branches . Eligibility : - Healthy individual ( include employee patient ) patient select skin disease , include individual gender racial/ethnic group . - Patient volunteer must willing undergo blood draw and/or skin/mucosal samples/monitoring . Design : -This dependent upon particular investigation sample need .
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : Healthy individual ( include employee patient ) , patient select skin disease , include individual gender racial/ethnic group . Patient volunteer must willing undergo blood draw and/or skin/mucosal sampling/monitoring include noninvasive skin sample . EXCLUSION CRITERIA : Strong family history and/or evidence keloid formation follow surgery trauma . Children age 18 year . Pregnant nursing woman .
